title: Who will win the Big 12 Title?
description:
Wendi Nix, Sam Acho, and Eddie Royal take a deep drive into which Big 12 players have the best chances to make their way into the NFL and which running backs could be the next Heisman winner. Plus, the crew discusses who will win the Big 12 title this year. Also, an analysis of the Big 12's top incoming transfers at quarterback this season.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew looks into notable Big 12 QB transfers and the odds that a RB will win the Heisman this year.
